channel.title: Ok 2 questions
channel.description:
how do i change it so when u log in ur a a certain place? and wht file do i go into to add like trees to a place client.java and justput them in soe how
last thing does any1 have a starter command layout thts all i need

item.title: Ok 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“b b0yz 4, post:1, topic:219384”]how do i change it so when u log in ur a a certain place? and wht file do i go into to add like trees to a place client.java and justput them in soe how

last thing does any1 have a starter command layout thts all i need[/quote]

That is 3 questions.

To change the starting place, search for ‘craft’ in player.java, and below it should be something like this:

teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####;

Change the Coordinates to whatever you like.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @mr13 mr.
item.description:
@mr13 wrote:

starter…

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
addItem(892, 1500);
sendMessage(“enjoi the starter pack-if you run out of food type ::food”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}

for changing the place where you start out go to player and press ctrl + f
and type in the x cords of your starting place.
it should look something like this

	teleportToX = 3367;
	teleportToY = 3267;
